The video was published on a Facebook pa: The Modular Body" and led to a website with more clips, indicating that it is part of a web series and not a documentary.
The video gained significant attention: being viewed over 6 million times within two days of its posting, raising questions about its authenticity.
The creator of the video: Floris Kaayk, confirmed in an interview that the characters and storyline, including the modular life form named Oscar, are fictional.
The field of research depicted in the vi: which involves creating operational organs with currently available technology, is still in its early stages and considered science fiction rather than a reality.
